name: Pack Leader
description: Creatures of your choice can add a d4 to the first Attack they make against your Target.

name: Coordinated Attack
description: Once per round, when you and an ally are Flanking your Target, if you land a successful attack, you or the ally can spend 1 AP for your ally to make an Attack as a Reaction.

name: Forceful Persuasion
description: You gain Proficiecy in your choice of the Threaten or Intimidation Skill. If you are already Proficient in that Skill, you instead gain Expertise in that Skill.

name: Dead or Alive
description: When you select a Target for your Hunter's Mark choose one of the following options:\\n- Alive: You have ADV on Grapple Checks against the Target. If you are holding rope and spend 2 additional AP while Grappling your Target, the target becomes Restrained by the rope.\\n- Dead: The damage from your Hunter's Strike increases by 1.
